applet
Class MessageImage

java.lang.Object
  applet.MessageImage
public class MessageImage
extends java.lang.Object

Utilities for building images showing shadowed messages. Includes a routine that uses Jef Poskanzer's GifEncoder to return the result as a GIF.

Does not run in JDK 1.1, since it relies on Java2D to build the images.

Taken from Core Servlets and JavaServer Pages from Prentice Hall and Sun Microsystems Press, http://www.coreservlets.com/. © 2000 Marty Hall; may be freely used or adapted.

Method Detail

makeMessageImage

public static java.awt.Image makeMessageImage(java.lang.String message,
                                              java.lang.String fontName,
                                              int fontSize)
Creates an Image of a string with an oblique shadow behind it. Used by the ShadowedText servlet and the ShadowedTextFrame desktop application.

sendAsGIF

public static void sendAsGIF(java.awt.Image image,
                             java.io.OutputStream out)
Uses GifEncoder to send the Image down output stream in GIF89A format. See http://www.acme.com/java/ for the GifEncoder class.
